addClient(address,string).author: Denis M. Putnam
addClient(address,string).details: Add's a client to the clientMap and the clientNameAddressMap

params._clientID: address of the wallet of the client.
params._name: string with the client's name.  This needs to be unique

addInvoice(string,uint256,uint256,uint25.author: Denis M. Putnam
addInvoice(string,uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Add's an invoice to be tracked.

params._invoiceSentDate: date that invoice was sent to the client.
params._numberHours: number of hours for the timesheet.

getClientByName(string).author: Denis M. Putnam
getClientByName(string).details: Get the client for the given name.

returns.count: of invoices associated with the given client

getInvoiceNumbers(string).author: Denis M. Putnam
getInvoiceNumbers(string).details: returned string is a comma separated string of invoice numbers.  The comma is also the end of the string if no other values appear.

returns._0: a comma seperated list of invoice numbers associated with the client.

getClientByIndex(uint256).notice: get the client by index number.
